::Zardus::

Zardus nods, taking the disk she handed him and sliding it into a 
wrist compartment, his scanners scanning it.

"Impressive... I think these will be ver useful, yes..."

He taps a few buttons on his wrist comp, frowning when he sees that 
KitKat's base was now not scannable (due to Destructor's jammers).

"I do have a mission for you, but it involves getting into a base that 
we know very little about, finding info, and perhaps assassinating the 
leader.."

While he was talking to Feline, his comm was silently replying to 
HotRod's message: "Welcome back, HotRod. If you could report to my 
position, I can get you up to date on everything."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Diamond::
> 
> She smiled. "I am very good at getting into heavily guarded or 
> secured areas." She handed Zardus a disk. "I got this from the 
> Maximal councils sealed document files back on cybertron. Only the 
> three head leaders where supposed to be able get access to these 
> files. I managed to get them. They contain structual plans for bases 
> and some new weapons designs. I hope they will be useful to
